item.description: We round out the year with our annual meeting, pot-luck dinner, and winter solstice party. We'll start with a pot-luck dinner at 7:30 PM. The winter solstice party will follow a brief annual meeting and election of officers for the 2012 calendar year at 8:00 PM, and will include a silent auction and live music. Please bring a dish to share for the pot-luck dinner. Items for the silent auction would also be appreciated.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll most likely be in the social hall near the main entrance.
item.name: Annual Meeting and Winter Solstice Party
